Raw: Next Monday afternoon the speakers will be Mrs. Pethick Law- renco and Miss Christabel Pankhurst , and Miss Decima Moore will recite " Woman This and Woman That . "

Location: St. James's Hall , Great Portland Street
Raw: every Thursday evening at St. James's Hall , Great Portland Street , from 8 to 10.
